alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, west central Androscoggin and north central Cumberland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Waterford, or 9 miles northwest of Mechanic Falls, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mechanic Falls, Turner, Waterford, Casco, Harrison, Buckfield, Hebron, Otisfield, Norway, Poland, Minot, Oxford, Paris and West Paris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
